mapper.sql: a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.id AS "id", a.factory_id AS "factory.id", a.workshop_id AS "workshop.id", a.line_id AS "line.id", a.code as "code", a.name AS "name", a.remarks AS "remarks", factory.name AS "factory.name", workshop.name AS "workshop.name", line.name AS "line.name"
LEFT JOIN base_factory factory ON factory.id = a.factory_id LEFT JOIN base_workshop workshop ON workshop.id = a.workshop_id LEFT JOIN base_productionline line ON line.id = a.line_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_site( create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, factory_id, workshop_id, line_id,code, name, remarks ) VALUES ( #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{factory.id}, #{workshop.id}, #{line.id},#{code}, #{name}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE base_site SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, factory_id = #{factory.id}, workshop_id = #{workshop.id}, line_id = #{line.id}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
